name: Pain-Bert
description:
Gamebert has allegedly stolen all the pitching coins!

It is in your duty to find out what happened by talking with Gamebert about the jam

Will you find out what happend by any means necessary?

Team:

Alexander Isopp: Programming, Game Design

Luca Pacheiner: Programming, Sound effects

Guido Prodnik: Game Design, Sound effects

Marco Leiter: Sound effects
